items.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
items.description: The latest iPhone with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system with ProRAW and ProRes video recording.

items.name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
items.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 200MP quad-camera setup, and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor.

items.name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
items.description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro offers a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, Tensor G3 chip, and a triple-camera system with advanced AI features.

items.name: OnePlus 11
items.description: The OnePlus 11 features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a Hasselblad camera system.

items.name: Xiaomi Mi 13 Pro
items.description: The Xiaomi Mi 13 Pro includes a 6.73-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and Leica camera technology.

items.name: Sony Xperia 1 IV
items.description: The Sony Xperia 1 IV features a 6.5-inch 4K OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, and a triple-camera system.

items.name: Oppo Find X6 Pro
items.description: The Oppo Find X6 Pro offers a 6.82-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and a Hasselblad camera system.

items.name: Asus ROG Phone 7
items.description: The Asus ROG Phone 7 is designed for gaming with a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and enhanced cooling.

items.name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
items.description: The most powerful and intelligent cordless vacuum by Dyson, featuring laser dust detection and up to 60 minutes of run time.

items.name: Roomba i7+ Robot Vacuum
items.description: The Roomba i7+ features Smart Mapping, powerful suction, and self-emptying capabilities for a hassle-free clean.

items.name: Shark Navigator Lift-Away
items.description: A versatile vacuum with Lift-Away functionality, powerful suction, and a HEPA filter for a deep clean.

items.name: Eufy RoboVac 11S
items.description: The Eufy RoboVac 11S is a slim robot vacuum with strong suction power and a quiet operation.

items.name: Bissell CrossWave
items.description: The Bissell CrossWave is a versatile wet/dry vacuum for cleaning both hard floors and carpets.

items.name: Dyson Ball Animal 2
items.description: A powerful vacuum by Dyson designed for homes with pets, featuring strong suction and advanced filtration.

items.name: Miele Complete C3
items.description: The Miele Complete C3 is a canister vacuum with powerful suction and an advanced filtration system.

items.name: Hoover WindTunnel 3
items.description: The Hoover WindTunnel 3 offers powerful suction and a multi-floor brush roll for versatile cleaning.

items.name: LG 55-Inch OLED TV
items.description: A 55-inch OLED TV with 4K Ultra HD resolution, AI-powered picture quality, and Dolby Vision IQ for immersive viewing experiences.

items.name: Sony 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
items.description: A 65-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR support, built-in Google Assistant, and a wide range of streaming options.

items.name: Samsung 75-Inch QLED TV
items.description: A 75-inch QLED TV with Quantum Dot technology, 4K resolution, and superior color accuracy for an immersive viewing experience.

items.name: TCL 50-Inch 4K Roku TV
items.description: A 50-inch 4K Roku TV with built-in Roku functionality for easy access to streaming services and excellent picture quality.

items.name: Vizio 70-inch-4k Smart TV
items.description: A 65-inch 4K Smart TV with Smartcast platform for easy streaming and high-definition picture quality.

items.name: Philips 58-Inch 4K UHD TV
items.description: A 43-inch 4K UHD TV with Ambilight technology for a more immersive viewing experience and vibrant colors.

items.name: Sharp 55-Inch Full HD TV
items.description: A 40-inch Full HD TV with excellent picture clarity and a slim design to fit any living room.

items.name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
items.description: Classic straight-leg jeans with a button fly and five-pocket styling. Made from 100% cotton denim.

items.name: Nike Air Max 270
items.description: The Nike Air Max 270 features a large Max Air unit in the heel for cushioning and a sleek design for everyday wear.

items.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22 T-shirt
items.description: Comfortable cotton t-shirt with the classic Adidas logo on the chest. Available in multiple colors.

items.name: Ralph Lauren Chinos Shirt
items.description: A timeless polo shirt with the Ralph Lauren logo embroidered on the chest. Made from breathable cotton.

items.name: Abercrombie Flannel Shirt
items.description: A cozy flannel shirt from Abercrombie, featuring a classic check pattern and button-down front.

items.name: Dockers Signature Khakis
items.description: Comfortable khaki pants from Dockers, featuring a classic fit and versatile styling.

items.name: Calvin Klein Graphic T-shirt
items.description: Stylish graphic t-shirt from Calvin Klein, made from soft cotton with a bold logo design.

items.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
items.description: Classic Converse Chuck Taylor All Star sneakers with a canvas upper and rubber sole.

items.name: Hugo Boss Suit Jacket
items.description: A refined suit jacket from Hugo Boss, tailored from premium wool fabric with a modern cut.

items.name: Burberry Trench Coat
items.description: Classic Burberry trench coat with a timeless design, made from high-quality cotton gabardine.

items.name: Tommy Hilfiger Polo Shirt
items.description: Classic polo shirt from Tommy Hilfiger with a relaxed fit and embroidered logo.

items.name: Vans Old Skool Sneakers
items.description: Iconic Vans Old Skool sneakers with a low-top silhouette and signature stripe.

items.name: New Balance 990v5
items.description: The New Balance 990v5 combines classic style with modern cushioning and support.

items.name: Reebok Classic Leather
items.description: The Reebok Classic Leather features a timeless design with a soft leather upper and EVA midsole for cushioning.

items.name: Puma RS-X
items.description: The Puma RS-X is a modern sneaker with a bold design and comfortable fit, perfect for everyday wear.
